trans-unit.source: Encapsulates zero or more components.
trans-unit.target: 封装零个或更多个组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> class is the default implementation for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>类是的默认实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>接口。

trans-unit.source: Containers are objects that encapsulate and track zero or more components.
trans-unit.target: 容器是封装并跟踪零个或多个组件的对象。

trans-unit.source: In this context, containment refers to logical containment, not visual containment.
trans-unit.target: 在此上下文中，包含引用逻辑包容，而不是直观包容。

trans-unit.source: You can use components and containers in a variety of scenarios, including scenarios that are both visual and not visual.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用组件和容器中的各种方案，包括 visual 和非可视化的方案。

trans-unit.source: The components in a container are tracked in a first-in, first-out list, which also defines the order of the components within the container.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个中先进先出列表，它还定义容器内的组件的顺序中，容器中的组件进行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Added components are appended to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 添加的组件将追加到列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 中添加一个 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />。

trans-unit.source: The component to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 添加到 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />。

trans-unit.source: The component is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: 该组件未命名。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is added to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>添加到列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The component to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的组件。

trans-unit.source: The unique, case-insensitive name to assign to the component.
trans-unit.target: 要给该组件分配的唯一的、区分大小写的名称。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" />, which leaves the component unnamed.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，它使组件保持未命名状态。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> and assigns it a name.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 添加到 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 并为其分配名称。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is added to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>添加到列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is not unique.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 不是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the components in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 中的所有组件。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the components in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 中的组件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: The components in the collection are stored in the same order as they were added to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: 由于添加到集合中的组件存储在相同的顺序<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to create a site for.
trans-unit.target: 要为其创建站点的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: The name to assign to <c>component</c>, or <see langword="null" /> to skip the name assignment.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给 <c>component</c> 的名称，或者为 <see langword="null" /> 以跳过名称分配。

trans-unit.source: Creates a site <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> for the given <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> and assigns the given name to the site.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> 创建一个站点 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />，并将给定名称分配给该站点。

trans-unit.source: The newly created site.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的站点。

trans-unit.source: If the `name` parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> without an identifying name.
trans-unit.target: 如果`name`参数是`null`、<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>添加到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>没有标识的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: Implementers that need to override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.CreateSite%2A> method can provide a custom implementation through a class that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> interface.
trans-unit.target: 需要重写的实施者<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.CreateSite%2A>方法可以提供通过实现的类的自定义实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>接口。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 占用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> 后，应调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>占用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在通过垃圾回收将 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 回收之前，释放非托管资源并执行其他清理操作。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的服务的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified type, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定类型的服务对象（如果可用）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementing the requested service, or <see langword="null" /> if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 实现所请求服务的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />；或者在无法解决服务的情况下为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method returns the current instance of the class if `service` is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>; otherwise, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认实现返回类的当前实例，如果`service`是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>; 否则为它将返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to provide a custom implementation to return a service object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写该方法以提供自定义实现可返回一个服务对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The component to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的组件。

trans-unit.source: Removes a component from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 中移除组件。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: The component to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的组件。

trans-unit.source: Removes a component from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> without setting <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 中移除组件，不将 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site" /> 设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.RemoveWithoutUnsiting%2A> method cleans up the site as usual, but it does not set the component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.RemoveWithoutUnsiting%2A>方法清理站点像往常一样，但不设置组件的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>属性`null`。

trans-unit.source: The named component.
trans-unit.target: 命名的组件。

trans-unit.source: The component name to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的组件名称。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the component name is unique for this container.
trans-unit.target: 确定组件名称对此容器是否唯一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.ValidateName%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Add%2A> method to determine if the name of the `component` being added is unique for this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.ValidateName%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Add%2A>方法可确定的名称`component`正在增加了对此唯一<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>。

trans-unit.source: If the `name` parameter is not `null` and is not unique, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`name`参数不是`null`并且不是唯一的<xref:System.ArgumentException>引发。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is not unique.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 不是唯一的。
